long_description: When you're moving fast and need warmth that won't weigh you down, wear the men's Marmot Baffin Jacket filled with lightweight synthetic insulation. Thermal R(TM) Eco synthetic insulation is made partially from recycled plastic; delivers good warmth for its weight. Ultra-lightweight, ripstop-nylon shell fabric; durable, embossed lining. Internal windflap seals out cold wind; chinguard protects skin from zipper abrasion. Elastic cuffs and drawcord hem seal in warmth. Zippered hand pockets and Napoleon chest pocket; jacket zips into the chest pocket for compact packing. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) allows full range of arm motion and prevents jacket from riding up when arms are raised. Closeout.
short_description: When you're moving fast and need warmth that won't weigh you down, wear the men's Marmot Baffin Jacket filled with lightweight synthetic insulation.
